author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zehnder Group Optimises Radiator Production Network In Europe
text:
May 29 (Reuters) - ZEHNDER GROUP AG:
* OPTIMISES RADIATOR PRODUCTION NETWORK IN EUROPE * SOME OF ITS PRODUCTION VOLUME WILL BE MOVED FROM SWITZERLAND TO FRANCE
* MOVE FROM SWITZERLAND TO FRANCE WILL RE-SULT IN THE LOSS OF 40 JOBS AT THE GRAENICHEN (CH) SITE
* JOB CUTS SHALL LARGELY BE COMPLETED BY THE BEGINNING OF 2019
* SPECIFICALLY, PLANS TO MOVE PRODUCTION FROM PLANT IN GRÄNICHEN (CH) TO VAUX-ANDIGNY (FR) Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
